name: Typing Defense
description:
This is a tower defense game where you need to type as fast as you can to protect yourself.

Just type the deactivation code, shown above the missiles, to destroy them.

Play in fullscreen to make it easier to read. And click on the game canvas if your keystrokes are not counting.

This prototype is open source and you can get its assets at PlayCanvas project page:
https://playcanvas.com/project/335066
